name: Arena (itch) (RickAnarchist)
description:
ARENA é um jogo de luta em 2D, até agora é possível jogar com um arqueiro, mas 

ARENA is a 2D fighting game, so far it is possible to play with an archer, but soon other characters are available.

If you want to play with a friend, only 1 gamepad will be possible, unfortunately, you will also have 1 gamepad and it is not possible to program the game to work with 2 gamepads.

The keys are:

Player 1: WASD, V and B 

Player 2: ARROWS, O and L

Please give feedback, I need to know if this game has a future.

Any donation is a big help.
